visual_directives: Hand-painted anime background art style inspired by Studio Ghibli and Kazuo Oga. Traditional watercolor textures on paper. Features lush vibrant greenery, massive fluffy cumulonimbus clouds (Ghibli clouds) in a deep blue sky, and idyllic, nostalgic scenery. intricate details in grass and foliage, soft dappled sunlight (komorebi), peaceful atmosphere. ALl character renditions are hand-drawn and painted in an anime style
